quest.name: A Pipe Dream
journal:
Managingway seeks your aid with Ways who dream of playing music.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Speak with Pipingway in Greatest Endsvale.
Deliver the requested items to Pipingway.
objectives: Speak with Pipingway in Greatest Endsvale.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Ah, Forename, your timing is impeccable. I have good tidings─the melodies of the musicking station appear to have struck a proverbial chord with a number of our Ways, who have incidentally come to me with a request.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: The music awoke something in them─the desire to play an instrument themselves. Naturally, we must nurture these burgeoning embers of passion within their hearts in a timely fashion, lest they be extinguished. I trust I can count on you?

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Forename! It seems even more of our Ways have developed an interest in playing an instrument. Might I ask for your help once more? Your support would mean the world to them.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Assuming that's a yes, allow me to point you in the direction of Greatest Endsvale, where you will find Pipingway eager to share all of the details with you. Best of luck!

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER4688
dialogue.text: <beep> This supporter would be positively thrilled to replenish any and all necessary materials should the need arise!

dialogue.name: PIPINGWAY
dialogue.text: There you are, Forename! Allow me to bring you up to speed. We've already requested some of the engineers to draw up plans for fabricating wind instruments designed for paws like yours truly.

dialogue.name: PIPINGWAY
dialogue.text: That said, we can hardly cobble together a random assortment of materials and call it a day. No, we need the finest components─ones suited to making an instrument sing, and not...er, scream? That, my esteemed artisan friend, is where you come in!

dialogue.name: PIPINGWAY
dialogue.text: Good to see you, Forename! Wouldn't you know it─after hearing us play our new instruments, a bunch of our fellow Ways are now hoping to join us. So many, in fact, that we frankly can't keep up with the demand!

dialogue.name: PIPINGWAY
dialogue.text: So...erm, we could really use your help again!

dialogue.name: PIPINGWAY
dialogue.text: Please see if you can craft a tuning slide with this assortment of delicate metals!

dialogue.name: PIPINGWAY
dialogue.text: Please see if you can craft a pipe with these exquisite woods we procured from Etheirys!

dialogue.name: PIPINGWAY
dialogue.text: Please see if you can craft a lubricant with these materials! We must stick all manner of moving bits together, you know. Instruments are so delightfully odd!

dialogue.name: PIPINGWAY
dialogue.text: Should you run out of materials, the doing supporter beside me can provide whatever you need.

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER4688
dialogue.text: How lovely, a materials request! <blip> <bleep> Bugger! It seems you already have a sufficient amount in your possession. You will have to deplete your present inventory before this supporter can assist you!

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER4688
dialogue.text: How lovely, a materials request! <blip> <bleep> Bugger! It seems you already have a sufficient amount in your possession. You will have to deplete your present inventory before this supporter can assist you!

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER4688
dialogue.text: How lovely, a materials request! <blip> <bleep> Bugger! It seems you already have a sufficient amount in your possession. You will have to deplete your present inventory before this supporter can assist you!

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER4688
dialogue.text: <blip> A materials request─how quaint! <beep> It is a delight to issue these supplies to you.

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER4688
dialogue.text: <blip> A materials request─how quaint! <beep> It is a delight to issue these supplies to you.

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER4688
dialogue.text: <blip> A materials request─how quaint! <beep> It is a delight to issue these supplies to you.

dialogue.name: PIPINGWAY
dialogue.text: Do let me know when you've finished!

dialogue.name: PIPINGWAY
dialogue.text: Oh, it's beautiful! We'll be able to make such wonderful instruments with this─not to mention music!

dialogue.name: PIPINGWAY
dialogue.text: I will take this marvelous component to the engineers. Thank you so much for lending us a paw, and do give Managingway my regards!

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: You are returned. And by your countenance, I take it you were able to assist them with their production woes.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Thank you, Forename. You've played an instrumental role in helping our Ways see their dreams to fruition. I hope that you continue to do the same for others.
